english.segment1: It is good to praise You lord. To make music to Your holy name most high. To sing a song of Your love in the morning. And Your faithfulness, Your faithfulness at night
english.segment2: Your deeds have made me glad. I sing for joy at the work of Your hands. You turned my mourning into dancing. And the foolish man just can't understand why
english.segment3: Oh I just want to sing Your praise. You're exalted forever. Oh let heaven and earth proclaim. You're exalted forever, God
english.segment4: Clothed in glory. In splendor you are arrayed. Angels surround Your throne. Crying holy is your name
